name: My Doggie Pug’s Life In Danger - Swim Hard To Escape
name_original: My Doggie Pug’s Life In Danger - Swim Hard To Escape
description:
————The Doggie Pug is ready swim harder and harder to cross the river————

My virtual pet is unaware about his swimming task and is given all alone across the river. Now it’s your task to escape him by getting hit towards the river bank and the edges by swiping the way through. Collect coins as well

Gameplay :

• Swipe to move along sideways

It’s too addictive. Try it!!
